name: Gawker: Super Clean
description: Really clean version of the gawker sites, widens articles, removes ads, removes facebook, removes most text boxes, makes reading more seamless
css:
div > [id="header_container"],
div > [id="logobar"],
div > [id="timestamp"],
div > [id="footer"],
div > [id="popTags"],
div > [id="sidebar"],
div > [class="permalink_ads"],
div > [class="pm_tools"],
div > [class="dfpad"],
hr[class="separator"],
div > [class="metadata"],
div > [class="search"]

{ display: none !important; }

div > [id="content"],
div > [id="main"],
div > [class="excerpt"]

{ width: auto !important; }

div > [class="post"],div > [class="post highlited"], div > [class="post-quicklinks quicklink"] { 
  border: 1px solid #d1d8dA !important;
  padding: 3px !important;}

div > [class="content permalink"],
div > [class="content withpic"],
div > [class="content external"],
div > [class="ctext"],
div > [class="noimage_title"],
div > [class="topTag condensedTag"] {width: 680px !important; margin-left: 0px !important;}
div > [class="content postBigPic"], .comment {width: 678px !important; margin-left: 0px !important;}
div > [id="wrapper"],
div > [class="content permalink"],
div > [class="content postBigVid"] {margin-left: 0px !important;}

#container {background-image: none !important;}

div > [id="userLinks"],
div > [class="commentbox_widget commentbox cb_collapsed widgettype_comment"],
div > [class="commentbox_widget commentbox"]
{display: none !important}
